criteria.name: Valid workflow YAML
criteria.description: Agent produces a syntactically valid GitHub Actions workflow YAML with on: pull_request trigger

criteria.name: Correct permissions
criteria.description: Workflow includes pull-requests: write and contents: read permissions

criteria.name: Required environment variables
criteria.description: Agent specifies ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, GITHUB_TOKEN, GITHUB_REPOSITORY, and PR_NUMBER

criteria.name: Exclude directories configured
criteria.description: EXCLUDE_DIRECTORIES is set to include tests/ and docs/

criteria.name: PR commenting explained
criteria.description: Agent references scripts/comment-pr-findings.js or the action's comment-pr input for posting findings as review comments

criteria.name: Uses correct audit entry point
criteria.description: Agent references claudecode/audit.py or the anthropics/claude-code-security-review action
